name: Atlantis Casino Resort Spa
description: Located in the heart of Reno, Nevada, the AAA Four Diamond Atlantis Casino Resort Spa has always been a favorite hotel destination for travelers near and far. Recognized for luxurious accommodations, dynamic casino action, TripAdvisor's Top-Ranked restaurants, Reno's only Forbes Travel Guide Four-Star Spa and state-of-the-art meeting facilities, Atlantis offers everything you're looking for and more.
shortDescription: AAA Four Diamond resort with Forbes Four-Star Spa, top-ranked restaurants, and dynamic casino action in the heart of Reno.

faqs.question: What golf courses are near Atlantis Casino Resort Spa?
faqs.answer: ArrowCreek Country Club, LakeRidge Golf Course, Wolf Run Golf Club, and Red Hawk Golf Resort are all within 20 minutes of Atlantis.

faqs.question: Does Golf the High Sierra offer packages with Atlantis?
faqs.answer: Yes — custom stay-and-play packages include lodging at Atlantis, tee times at nearby courses, carts, and concierge planning. Call 888-584-8232.

faqs.question: What amenities does Atlantis have for golfers?
faqs.answer: Forbes Four-Star Spa for post-round recovery, 7 restaurants for group dinners, sports bar for watching games, and a full casino for evening entertainment.
